roleset.name: poll, examine, research, to examine or poll
roleset.note: SURVEY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'survey' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from survey.01-v)
SURVEY-N NOTES: Based on survey.01. Verbnet class investigate 35.4. Framed by Katie. Frame updated by Claire in accordance with annotator requests. (from survey.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: Among [the major banks]-1 surveyed [*]-1 by Banxquote in six regions of the country , 8.33 % is the highest yield available .
example.arg: in six regions of the country

example.name: with Arg3
example.text: Fully 62 % of [the doctors]-1 surveyed [*]-1 for Metropolitan Life Insurance Co. think [0] their fellow physicians are responsible for rising health-care costs , ahead of hospitals ( 55 % ) and patients ( 48 % ) .

example.name: transitive
example.text: The Association of Quality Clubs , which [*T*-41] puts 1988 industry revenue at $ 5 billion [*U*], surveyed the health-conscious over-40 market and found that 43 % exercise regularly .
example.arg: The Association of Quality Clubs , which [*T*-41] puts 1988 industry revenue at $ 5 billion [*U*],

example.name: passive participle
example.text: Of [1,224 companies]-1 surveyed [*]-1 , 31 % [*T*-1] expect [*-2] to cut spending on plant equipment and machinery , while only 28 % [*T*-1] plan [*-3] to spend more .

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: The study surveyed a national group of medical directors , personnel managers and employee assistance program directors about their perceptions of these problems in their companies .
example.arg: a national group of medical directors , personnel managers and employee assistance program directors
about their perceptions of these problems in their companies

example.name: Args, 0, 1, 3
example.text: The consumer confidence survey for the Conference Board by National Family Opinion Inc. is conducted every November.
example.arg: by National Family Opinion Inc. , a Toledo , Ohio , market researcher

example.name: Args 1 and 2 (but not 0, as its is seperated by a verb)
example.text: The San Francisco Chronicle did a survey with its reader's of most annoying celebrities

example.name: Example with just 'entity surveyed'
example.text: A survey of the National Olympic Committees

example.name: NP only
example.text: their survey of the area for fault lines

example.name: Slightly different sense of survey
example.text: The class is a survey of Italian Renaissance painters.

roleset.name: inspect/measure/assess property
roleset.note: SURVEY-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Member of VNcls investigate-35.4, sight-30.2. (from survey.02-v)

example.name: args0, 1, 3. value assessment
example.text: my mortgage lender surveyed the property at 136 000, the initial.

example.name: spatial measurement
example.text: However, Bowers's son-in-law, Roy Green, Jr., who is a surveyor, prepared a plat in 1975 that-1 *trace*-1 surveyed the property at 131 acres.

example.name: Args 1, 2
example.text: It may be necessary to have [the property]-1 surveyed *-1 for property lines, elevations and more, depending on the project.
example.arg: for property lines, elevations and more, depending on the project

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: An alternate to bridging is a non status mortgage , but [the lender]-1 will still need *PRO*-1 to survey the property and carry out the nusual due dilligence to include full legal conveyancing and checks .
